user.title: FileFlows Integration Setup
user.description: Connect to your FileFlows server. Most installations don't require authentication.

data_description.name: A friendly name for this FileFlows integration
data_description.url: Full URL to FileFlows (e.g., http://192.168.1.18:8585) - Use this OR specify host/port separately
data_description.host: The IP address of your FileFlows server (e.g., 192.168.1.18) - Use this if not using URL
data_description.port: The port FileFlows is running on (commonly 8585 or 19200)
data_description.api_key: Leave blank - most FileFlows installations don't require authentication
data_description.scan_interval: How often to update data from FileFlows (seconds)
data_description.connected_last_seen_timespan: How long to consider nodes as connected (minutes)

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to FileFlows server. Verify the URL/host, port, and that FileFlows is running.
error.invalid_host: Invalid host configuration. Check your URL format or host/port settings.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Check the logs for details.

abort.already_configured: This FileFlows server is already configured in Home Assistant.
